verses.verse: A Psalm, a Song for the sabbath day. It is a good <WH2896> thing to give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, And to sing praises <WH2167> unto thy name <WH8034>, O Most High <WH5945>;
To show forth <WH5046> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> in the morning <WH1242>, And thy faithfulness <WH530> every night <WH3915>,
With an instrument of ten strings <WH6218>, and with the psaltery <WH5035>; With a solemn sound <WH1902> upon the harp <WH3658>.
For thou <WH3068>, Jehovah, hast made me glad <WH8055> through thy work <WH6467>: I will triumph <WH7442> in the works <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>.
How great <WH1431> are thy works <WH4639>, O Jehovah <WH3068>! Thy thoughts <WH4284> are very <WH3966> deep <WH6009>.
A brutish <WH1198> man <WH376> knoweth <WH3045> not <WH3684>; Neither doth a fool understand this <WH995>:

When the wicked <WH7563> spring <WH6524> as the grass <WH6212>, And when all the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> do flourish <WH6692>; It is that they shall be destroyed <WH8045> for ever <WH5703>.
But thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, art on high <WH4791> for evermore <WH5769>.
For <WH341>, lo, thine enemies, O Jehovah <WH3068>, For <WH341>, lo, thine enemies shall perish <WH6>; All the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> shall be scattered <WH6504>.
But my horn <WH7161> hast thou exalted like the horn of the wild-ox <WH7214>: I am anointed <WH1101> with fresh <WH7488> oil <WH8081>.
Mine eye <WH5869> also hath seen <WH5027> my desire on mine enemies <WH7790>, Mine ears <WH241> have heard <WH8085> my desire of the evil-doers <WH7489> that rise up against me <WH6965>.
The righteous <WH6662> shall flourish <WH6524> like the palm-tree <WH8558>: He shall grow <WH7685> like a cedar <WH730> in Lebanon <WH3844>.
They are planted <WH8362> in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>; They shall flourish <WH6524> in the courts <WH2691> of our God <WH430>.
They shall still bring forth fruit <WH5107> in old age <WH7872>; They shall be full of sap <WH1879> and green <WH7488>:
To show <WH5046> that Jehovah <WH3068> is upright <WH3477>; He is my rock <WH6697>, and there is no unrighteousness in him <WH5766>.
